update crm_item${uid}
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num_iid = #{numIid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
approve_status = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
has_showcase = #{hasShowcase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
has_discount = #{hasDiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
seller_cids = #{sellerCids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
props = #{props,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input_pids = #{inputPids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input_str = #{inputStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
list_time = #{listTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delist_time = #{delistTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stuff_status = #{stuffStatus,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zip = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_payer = #{freightPayer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_3D = #{is3D,jdbcType=TINYINT},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sell_promise = #{sellPromise,jdbcType=TINYINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_desc = #{itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
properties = #{properties,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sku_price = #{skuPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_created = #{skuCreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_modified = #{skuModified,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_status = #{skuStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_properties_name = #{skuPropertiesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_spec_id = #{skuSpecId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sku_with_hold_quantity = #{skuWithHoldQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sku_delivery_time = #{skuDeliveryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_prop = #{changeProp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
props_name = #{propsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
promoted_service = #{promotedService,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_lightning_consignment = #{isLightningConsignment,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_fenxiao = #{isFenxiao,jdbcType=INTEGER},

property_alias = #{propertyAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
after_sale_id = #{afterSaleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_xinpin = #{isXinpin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sub_stock = #{subStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
features = #{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_weight = #{itemWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_size = #{itemSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sell_point = #{sellPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_thru = #{validThru,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auto_fill = #{autoFill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc_modules = #{descModules,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom_made_type_id = #{customMadeTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wireless_desc = #{wirelessDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newprepay = #{newprepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_fee = #{postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_fee = #{expressFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ems_fee = #{emsFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
global_stock_type = #{globalStockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
global_stock_country = #{globalStockCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
large_screen_image_url = #{largeScreenImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optlock = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdDate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastModifiedBy = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifiedDate = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where num_iid=#{numIid}
